segments.text: Do you still see the people we went to school with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did for a while , I suppose , until I left university , but after that not really .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I've lost touch with most people as well , but I still see Rose occasionally .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , how's she getting on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I suppose , but she's had a rough time in the last few years , She got divorced .
segments.speaker: S1
